details: Uses `oklch()` for perceptually uniform colors. Includes Hex fallbacks for legacy tools (Mermaid). Excellent architectural choice.
High contrast ratios in default themes (Dark text on White bg).
`AnchorNavigation` explicitly handles focus after scrolling. `tabindex` is managed.
Logic in `script.js` detects mobile width and toggles classes. This is fragile compared to CSS Media Queries but allows for specific JS behavior.
